attributes.action: Southwest Pay Cuts for NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: 19 NHS trusts within the the Southwest of the UK are planning to to cut NHS staffs wages, leave and increase working hours. These proposals are claimed to be non-optional and enforced by the trusts working in unison. Your signature will express your objection to these proposals and aid the subjects debate in the House of Commons.

government_response.details:
This e-petition has been identified as an unintentional duplicate of an existing petition on the site, and it has been agreed that it will be closed to new signatures.

The remaining e-petition, which calls for the same action as this, can be found at http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/36063
